docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live- docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documreloadingentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: arkIQ System Documentation
docs.text:
All arkIQ's LoRaWAN devices are currently on The Things Stack.

Server: https://smarttechsolutions.nam1.cloud.thethings.industries

docs.title: Applications on TTN
docs.text: TTN applications are defined according to the types of devices.

docs.title: Decoders
docs.text:
Each application's decoder depends on the device type and manufacturer:

👉 Decoder Repository on Google Drive

docs.title: Data Transmission
docs.text:
The Things Stack stores only a limited number of device uplinks.

Therefore, devices send uplinks directly to AWS using a private key.
